original_text: Having then gifts differing according to the grace that is given to us, whether prophecy, let us prophesy according to the proportion of faith;
korean_text: 우리에게 주신 은혜대로 받은 은사가 각각 다르니 혹 예언이면 믿음의 분수대로,

sentences.original_text: Having then gifts differing according to the grace
sentences.korean_translation: 그러하다 은사들을 가지고 있노니 다른 은사들에 따라

sentences.original_text: let us prophesy according to the proportion of faith
